name: Save Her, Mister Circle!
description:
Have I done it? Is it finally here?

Good. I need your help. I'm from an alternate timeline, but let me explain.

Years ago, a toddler in a school far away from my county managed to draw a creature. A creature that gained sentience. A creature that managed to find its way onto everything. It would vanish from its notebook just to hop into another 2 dimensional world. It wreaked havoc on everything, paintings, governments paperwork...and when it touched those important documents, our world was ruined.

I managed to seal it away before it could doom the rest of humanity, right into this little game I created. However, it's not happy, not at all. I've sent the game here, to this timeline, to ensure it cannot destroy the rest of mine.

Now now, calm down! I don't mean for it to harm your world next. I designed that software to make it feel right at home. But I do count on you...in order for the demon to never escape to another place...

You must keep it entertained. And that means...to play the game. All of you. So it remains fractured.

So it stays neutralized.

(This game was made in a single week as part of my tests of skill, a series of one-shots I call "Game In a Week").

This is an itch.io release of the same game on Gamejolt, which you can also play an HTML/mobile version of here: https://gamejolt.com/games/savehermistercircle/506795

This itch.io release is PC/Mac only, will not have leaderboard support, and was created with a donation option.

Read through the lines.  Contain the demon.
